document_data.mainbody:
The Morning Halls was a temple to Lathander, the Morninglord, found in the city of Tantras in the Vast.
The Morning Halls lay in the northern part of the city, on Ember Lane.
During the Time of Troubles of the Year of Shadows, 1358 DR, the deity Torm resided at his temple in Tantras. Torms zealous priests began persecuting followers of other faiths in the city as "unbelievers". Although normally very busy, the Morning Halls was almost completely deserted as a result of the divine strife in the Realms.It is not known if or how the Morning Halls was affected by this religious persecution.
Nevertheless, the Morning Halls remained active through to 1367 DR and past 1370 DR.
In 1358 DR, the temple was led by High Morninglord Alansyn Ambrilar, with fourteen priests and twenty-one lay-followers.
